overview: In September 2004 on location in Spain shooting the big-budget erotic title Butterfly, international adult star Sophie Moone and newcomer Stella took a small hand-held DV camera and made their own movie! They roped their co-stars into doing scenes together in their free time. This film is made from the seven hours of footage they captured and then gave to legendary adult producer Viv Thomas.  Starring 8 stunning models and containing 7 scenes of graphic hardcore sex, fingers in arses and deep lesbian kisses...this movie could ONLY have been filmed by women! They canâ€™t keep their hands off each other, they can't stop giggling, and they can't keep the camera still.
tagline: A film made by the models!
title: Our Movie
